content.header:
** Post Coffee for sale **
Code: %code%
Expires in: %time left%
Rating: %***** %
content.comment:
For post rating, show a number of stars from * to *****
The rating is the combined rating score of this post only (not the rating of the poster)

%time left%, (see moment.js), eg:
just show most relevant time unit (days if >=24 hours)
(hours if >=1 <=24 hours)
(mins if >=1 <=59)
60s = 60 seconds
1d = 1 day
6h = 6 hours
4m = 4 minutes
